headline: Martin Marietta to Host Capital Markets Day on September 3, 2025
summary: RALEIGH, N.C., July 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. (NYSE: MLM) (Martin Marietta or the Company), a leading national supplier of aggregates and heavy building materials, today announced that it will host a Capital Markets Day on Wednesday, September 3, 2025, beginning at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time, at the Mandarin Oriental in New York City. Ward Nye, Chair, President and Chief Executive Officer, joined by other members of the Company’s leadership team, will discuss Marti
